channel.title: RuneXLock (711/712) New skilling PVM AND PKING Server
channel.description:
Hello i have just starting coding servers and just put my first ever server online its called RuneXlock if you want to play a server witch has all boss all skills and more this is the server for you and we are looking for admins and mods you can check our site out as well
Home -
- Auto-Mass save every 10 seconds. - Almost all skills are working/added except for a few I didn't bother with like Agility and Dungeoneering isn't full added. - Prayer tab with Rapid Renewal, Rigour, and Augury. - Curse prayers. - Quick prayers for curses and normal prayer. - Lunar interface fixed with Group Vengeance. - Minigames like Duel Arena, Barrows, Fight pits, and others fully working. - Boss's like KBD, Godwars, Daggs, and Chaos Ele. - 711 items. - 712 Characters. - 711 Animations. - 711 Gfx. - x10 and normal hitting with new hitmarks. - Added tab hovering my way because couldn't add them the other way. - Custom quick chat interface when quick chat icon is clicked. - New Friends and Ignore tab/list. - Much more. just to lazy to type it all! download it. trust me.
pics:
[IMG]http://i886.photobucket.com/albums/ac62/xtmxMonster/k9f1ur.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i886.photobucket.com/albums/ac62/xtmxMonster/e5k5y9.png[/img]
there will be more pics later
Download Link:
http://uppit.com/n68xcamfwv8c/New_RuneXlock.rar
